item.title: Hanukkah Kosher Meals – Sign Up Now!
item.description: We are pleased to offer Hanukkah Kosher Meals this season! If you would like to participate, please be sure to reserve your meal in advance. Sign-Up Deadline: December 7th at 11:59 PM
item.author: Students

item.title: Winter Weather Shuttle Information
item.description: As the season for inclement weather approaches, please be advised that shuttle operations may be impacted by adverse conditions. To ensure the safety of both drivers and passengers, service modifications—including alternate routing, service delays, temporary suspension, or full cancellation—may be implemented as necessary.
item.author: Community

item.title: Shut the Sash: Fume Hood Energy Conservation
item.description: Attention lab users! Minimize chemical exposure and reduce campus energy use by closing the fume hood sash when not in use. To support this practice, Environmental Health & Safety (EHS) has placed Shut the Sash stickers on chemical fume hoods, which can help reduce energy consumption by up to 40%.
item.author: Community

item.title: Winter Sounds Performances on December 7
item.description: End of the semester musical performance by student members of the RPI Chamber Ensembles in the DCC Media Studio. As well as performances by faculty music fellows performing Composition Seminar students final compositions. 3:30pm-4:30pm Chamber part 1 4pm-6pm Chamber part 2 7pm-8:30pm Composition Seminar

item.title: Red & White Winter Celebration | Dec. 6
item.description: Date: Saturday, December 6, 2025 2:00 PM - 3:00 PM - Voting on holiday trees decorated by clubs and fraternities. Winners announced by President Marty Schmidt! Vote for your favorite tree, enjoy games and refreshments, and pick up free swag at the ’86 Field!

item.title: Claim your Bloomberg.com account courtesy of RPI Libraries
item.description: The RPI Libraries are pleased to announce campus access to Bloomberg.com, a premier resource for business and financial information and global insights. Sign in using your RPI credentials for unlimited access to Bloomberg.com, including live radio, podcasts, narrated articles, and live streaming of Bloomberg TV. Also available on the Bloomberg app!
item.author: Community

item.title: First Cohort of CEPM Ph.D. Students Reflect on Their Inaugural Semester
item.description: This semester, the RPI-Mt. Sinai Center for Engineering and Precision Medicine (CEPM) welcomed the inaugural cohort of students in the center’s Ph.D. program in health sciences engineering jointly offered by RPI and Icahn School of Medicine at Mount Sinai.
item.author: Community

item.title: Chef JJ Johnson to visit campus on December 8th
item.description: We’re excited to welcome Chef JJ Johnson to campus! James Beard–nominated chef and owner of FIELDTRIP in NYC, Chef JJ Johnson will be joining us in Commons Dining Hall on Monday, December 8th for two special appearances: 12–2 PM and 5–7 PM. For more information please follow Rensselaer Dining on social media @rensselaerdining or email dining@rpi.edu.

item.title: Information Security - Proper Disposal and Data Destruction of Technology Equipment
item.description: Please review our Procedures for Proper Disposal of Technology Equipment, including hard drives, batteries, laptops, desktops, servers, and other equipment that may contain Rensselaer data.

item.title: Volunteers Needed: Late Night Breakfast at Commons!
item.description: Help our students get fueled up for finals by helping with Late Night Breakfast on December 11th at Commons Dining Hall. We are looking for enthusiastic faculty and staff volunteers to help make the event a success! If you’re interested in volunteering, please sign up by emailing auxiliaryservices@rpi.edu

item.title: Division of Human Resources Professional Development Workshop: “Getting the Most Out of AI with Percipio” | Dec. 9
item.description:
Date: Tuesday, December 9, 2025 10:00 AM - 10:30 AM - “Getting the Most Out of AI with Percipio” This workshop introduces you to Percipio’s AI Chat, AI Skill Benchmarks, and interactive AI scenarios. You’ll learn how to navigate AI Chat to explore ideas, ask questions, and get quick support. You’ll also be shown how to access and complete AI Skill Benchmarks and use guided scenarios to practice applying Percipio’s AI features.

For information about sharing your news or events, or to change your subscription settings, visit morningmail.rpi.edu.
